channel.title: How to make an embed video play?
channel.description:
Alright i know how to embed it into the webpage. My problem is that it wont play the video... Like it loads the media player then when you click play it says buffering then stops right after... Im not sure what the problem is. Also i am hosting it off of my computer.
and yes i am pretty new to web design...

item.title: How to make an embed video play?
item.dc:creator: @S_ms S!ms
item.description:
@S_ms wrote:

Yeah, buy a real host.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make an embed video play?

item.title: How to make an embed video play?
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“S!ms, post:15, topic:162995”][quote author=Bobby link=topic=221596.msg1923364#msg1923364 date=1197264963]
How can you say thats untrue. If I clikc firefox first, then Ie, Ie comes up frst by at elast half a minute everytime…
[/quote]

Ah, loading like that. Well, maybe IE is integrated into windows and firefox is not?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 10, 2007, 02:16:35 PM[/size][hr][quote author=billygotshot link=topic=221596.msg1923436#msg1923436 date=1197268266]
can we get back ontopic and help me out please
[/quote]

I think your server doesn’t allow streaming media.[/quote]

any idea on how to get my server to allow streaming media?

Read full topic

item.title: How to make an embed video play?
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

Bobby:

I can’t help you with that, but until someone does, you can upload it onto youtube and post a link or something

i wont to be able to host it on my site… otherwise i would do what you suggested.

vortex:

maybe you should find a flash video player, like youtube’s but free and one you can use

hmm never though about that… ill try that thanks.
